attraction_knownFor: "“ Restful oasis in middle of town ” Reviewed 3 weeks ago This lovely spot is in the middle of town, overlooked by the Omni Hotel amongst other tall buildings. There is a walkway, a lake, and plenty of tables and chairs where one can rest and enjoy the spot. It's a sunken area (on the side of a hill, really), and there's a walkway around the top of it as well.... More Helpful? Thank fussytraveller29 Report"
mention_address: "California Plaza, Bunker Hill, LA, Los Angeles County, California, 90012, United States of America"
